entries.message:
Validation result for _sources/cs/rules.shacl:
  Validation Report
  Conforms: False
  Results (12):
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:CoordinateSystemShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A coordinate system should have at least one axis
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:3DCoordinateSystemShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/3DCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A 3D coordinate system should have at least three axes

  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/DateTimeTemporalCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A date time temporal coordinate system should have exactly one axis

  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CylindricalCoordinateSystem>

  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/ConicalCoordinateSystem>

  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CurvilinearCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A curvilinear coordinate system is defined in Euclidean space and should therefore have at least three axes
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:1DCoordinateSystemShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/1DCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A 1D coordinate system should have exactly one axis
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):

  	Source Shape: geosrs:TemporalMeasureCoordinateSystemShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/TemporalMeasureCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A temporal measure coordinate system should have exactly one axis
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):

  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/TemporalCountCoordinateSystem>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axis
  	Message: A temporal count coordinate system should have exactly one axis
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):

  	Source Shape: geosrs:CoordinateSystemAxisShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CoordinateSystemAxis>
  	Result Path: geosrs:axisDirection

entries.message:
Validation result for _sources/datum/rules.shacl:
  Validation Report
  Conforms: False
  Results (1):
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:ParametricDatumShape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/ParametricDatum>
  	Result Path: geosrs:definingParameter
  	Message: A parametric datum should have at least one defining parameter

SHACL.errorMessage:
A shape defined as a PropertyShape cannot have more than one 'sh:path' predicate.
For reference, see https://www.w3.org/TR/shacl/#property-shapes
SHACL.message:
Error running SHACL validation for _sources/srs/rules.shacl: A shape defined as a PropertyShape cannot have more than one 'sh:path' predicate.
For reference, see https://www.w3.org/TR/shacl/#property-shapes
